revised_title: Hydrogen's Impact on Superconductivity and Magnetism in High-\lt;italic\gt;T\lt;sub\gt;c\lt;/sub\gt;\lt;/italic\gt; Materials
tldr: This article discusses the effects of hydrogen on superconductivity and magnetism in high-\lt;italic\gt;T\lt;sub\gt;c\lt;/sub\gt;\lt;/italic\gt; materials. The authors review experimental results on hydrogen-charged YBaCuO materials and explore topics such as hydrogen site, superconductivity, normal state transport properties, structural changes, and hydrogen-induced magnetism. They also discuss the formation of a hydride phase and its potential connection to magnetic ordering.
